### Weekly Writing

This week, your task is to write a short description (approximately one paragraph) that __describes the workflow__ of building training data, building a simple model, then refining that model using either forward selection or a shrinkage method. In short: imagine you were explaining this to your cousin who is a freshman at MSU. Give a basic primer.
